title: Dining Hall
subtitle: Room
content:
This is the room where the food is served.

We eat here, but the cooking is done in the kitchen.

title: Kitchen
subtitle: Room
content:
This is, of course, the room where the food is cooked.

When it's ready, the food is served in the dining hall or, occasionally, in the library on the first floor.

title: Library
subtitle: Room
content:
Lots of books are stored here.

The large space at the center of the room is sometimes used to host banquets.
